about:
I am a skilled software engineer with a strong background in computer science and a passion for innovation. As a Ruby on Rails developer at Codeminer 42, I have honed my skills in the latest technologies and have a deep understanding of the full software development lifecycle. In addition to my technical skills, I have a proven track record of scientific research and a dedication to staying ahead of the curve in emerging technologies. During my academic career, I published a number of research papers and received recognition for my work at a national event. With expertise in artificial intelligence, backend development, and data analysis and mining, I bring a unique combination of technical knowledge and creative problem-solving to every project I work on. If you're looking for a highly skilled software engineer to help drive your business forward.
